timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.bodyText:
what happens when i --suite "" or --suite my-suite, or --suite my-suite,,my-another-suite
?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Picocli will handle --suite suite-1 --suite suite-2. In case of --suite suite-1,,suite-2 it will create list with an empty string that will be handled by our logic: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No suite with name ''.
replies.author: wendigo
